# Next.js Project - knoverfront

This is an empty Next.js project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and App Router.

## Project Setup Complete

- [x] Created copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Clarified project requirements (TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, App Router)
- [x] Scaffolded Next.js project using create-next-app
- [x] Project customization (skipped for empty project)
- [x] Extension installation (no extensions required)
- [x] Compiled project successfully
- [x] Created and ran dev task
- [x] Documentation complete

## Running the Project

The development server is currently running at http://localhost:3000

To start the server manually:
```bash
npm run dev
```

To build for production:
```bash
npm run build
```

To start production server:
```bash
npm start
```

## Available Scripts

- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16.1.1
- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- ESLint
